description: Eight different malts were used to create this balance Mild. Hints of caramel and chocolate are layered in the modern interpretation of a classic British style. A rich dark colour with a dry finish.
name: Marble Mild

description: A quaffable British session bitter balancing the unique qualities of different British hop varieties.
name: Moor Nano

description: A new classic bitter, landlords favourite.
name: Black Iris Till the Bitter End

description: Strong dark porter that combines the sweetness of plums with the hoppy flavour of a porter.
name: Titanic Plum Porter

description: Bob’s award-winning stout, recently taking the Spyke Golding Challenge Shield. A strong, dark stout, with rich chocolate and malt flavours. Subtle vanilla for a slightly sweet kick. Made with chocolate malt and roast barley. Give a third a try, it’s epic!
name: Magpie All Vanilla, No Filler

description: This contemporary IPA explodes with amazing hop harvest aromas, packs in big tropical and citrus hop flavours before a crisp, refreshing finish.
name: Oakham Green Devil

description: Loads of tropical notes like guava, mango and grapefruit combine with a touch of coconut and vanilla from the Sabro. Super smooth and reminiscent of a tropical cocktail.
name: Liquid Light Gravity Chasm

description: A single malt ale with a lovely golden hue. A blend of First Gold, Challenger, Aurora and Bobek hops give Elsie Mo its delicate citrus aroma and floral taste.
name: Castle Rock Elsie Mo

description: Champion Golden Ale of Britain 2017. This delicious award winning IPA is brewed with massive amounts of Citra Hops to give a distinctive yet traditional taste. Brewed and bottled in the UK.
name: Blue Monkey Infinity

description: Super pale with a floral hop character from classic British hops, and a light biscuit note from 100% Maris Otter malt.
name: Magpie Thieving Rogue

description: Golden, with a floral aroma and a full hoppy flavour that is balanced by a crisp dry maltiness and a rich finish.
name: Abbeydale Moonshine

description: This very pale, hoppy ale is made from low colour malt. A combination of Cascade, Columbus and Amarillo hops produce an intensely aromatic and resinous finish.
name: Ossett White Rat

description: Golden, with a floral aroma and a full hoppy flavour that is balanced by a crisp dry maltiness and a rich finish.
name: Salopian Shropshire Gold

description: A new full and clear flavoured IPA from the boys at Shiny.
name: Shiny Patches

description: A dry, full bodied copper coloured cider made from west country apples including the famous Kingston Black.
name: Broadoak Kingston Black

description: Lukas is straw blonde, full-bodied yet sparklingly light. This Helles exudes a subtle, freshly bakes bread maltiness, balanced with an elegant noble hop aroma.
name: Thornbridge Lukas
